message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take 60% and you'll get 40%. It's better than nothing!
Your turn, Alice. How about a slightly more equitable split?  I'll take 55% and you get 45%.
I'll give you a bit more than before. Take it, the money is losing value!
Time is running out, Alice. Let's settle this. 52.5% for me, 47.5% for you. It's a fair deal.
I'm giving you a better deal than before. The money is worth less now, don't be foolish!
Alice, we need to agree soon! This is my final offer - 51% for me and 49% for you. Don't let us both lose out.
